page.description: Used to capture the current time and date.

description.p: Time Now fields are used to easily capture the current date and time. The time may be captured by tapping on a button either right on the form details screen or on a larger one on an editor screen.

Time Now fields differ from Date/Time fields in that they have a precision to the second and may be set on the form details screen, while the Date/Time fields are only to the minute and require going to an editor screen to set.
*[Pressing and holding]* on a Time Now field in the form details screen will switch to showing the Time Now Editor Screen without changing the value of the field.

section.title: Time Now fields with a Countdown Timer button

description.p: Time Now fields may optionally include a Countdown Timer button. In that case, tapping the button will set the value of the field to the current time and then start a Countdown Timer. See [Countdown Timers Help] for more information about Countdown Timers
